text:
Part 1: Artificial TARDIS Creation
In order to obtain a standard type 1 Artificial TARDIS, you must first craft an empty shell. Upon placing the empty shell, you must add four structural beams, then four plasmic shell plates.
 Upon placing the plasmic shell plating on the structural beams, you must weld the plasmic shell plates to the beams (see: Crafting chapter - Welding)
